name: 0x3f-problem-datasources Updater

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: '*/5 * * * *'  # 测试用5分钟间隔
  workflow_dispatch:

permissions:
  contents: write

env:
  NODE_ENV: production
  PROJECT_DIR: 0x3f-problem-datasources
  TZ: Asia/Shanghai

jobs:
  update-data:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    
    steps:
      - name: Checkout main branch
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          fetch-depth: 0

      - name: Create or switch to target branch
        run: |
          if git show-ref --verify --quiet refs/heads/0x3f-problem-datasources; then
            git checkout 0x3f-problem-datasources
          else
            git checkout --orphan 0x3f-problem-datasources
            git rm -rf .
            # 可选：添加初始文件
            echo "# 0x3f Problem Datasources" > README.md
            git add README.md
            git commit -m "Initialize 0x3f-problem-datasources branch"
          fi

      - name: Setup Node.js
        uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: '18'
          cache: 'npm'
          cache-dependency-path: ${{ env.PROJECT_DIR }}/package-lock.json

      - name: Install dependencies
        working-directory: ${{ env.PROJECT_DIR }}
        run: npm ci

      - name: Run update script
        working-directory: ${{ env.PROJECT_DIR }}
        run: npm run dev

      - name: Commit and push changes
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "wuxin0011"
          git config --global user.email "2191377759@qq.com"
          git add .
          if git diff-index --quiet HEAD; then
            echo "No changes to commit"
          else
            git commit -m "Auto-update data [skip ci]"
            git push origin 0x3f-problem-datasources
          fi
